comments.content: See FAQ #2: Please use a [descriptive title for your posting](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022084525/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2) next time.

you can also use blue highway, but if you do, you need to rasterize or vectorize it before inserting it into an indesign doc. the font won't allow you to embed it when you go to prepress (pdf for instance)

In the spirit of unbridled creativity,

Troy Vera  
Kingdom Graphics  
 [http://www.kingdomgraphics.biz](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022084525/http:/www.kingdomgraphics.biz/ "http://www.kingdomgraphics.biz")
